item.title: Help with using clients as your source
item.dc:creator: @mrdek11 mrdek11
item.description:
@mrdek11 wrote:

That’s more english than you post was.
It means you can’t use a client as a source. Get a server download.

Read full topic
item.source: Help with using clients as your source

item.title: Help with using clients as your source
item.dc:creator: @helpless helpless
item.description:
@helpless wrote:

English plz[quote=“mrdek11, post:2, topic:108855”]You can’t use a client as your source… you need a server for the client to connect to.[/quote]

Read full topic
